name: Outwired
description:
>Hello, Passenger G3454
>I am sorry to disturb your hypersleep
>There has been a minor mishap involving an unexpected encounter with a high-velocity meteoroid
>Unfortunately, the entire crew of this spacecraft has been rendered
>...
>Dead

Take the role of a surprised passenger turned makeshift pilot in this stress-inducing game about an out-of-control spacecraft traversing through an asteroid field. 

Outwired uses a unique mechanism of mechanical circuit board wiring that is mapped directly on your keyboard. Explore the ship’s system in a rogue-like environment, and divide your attention between activating critical systems, such as life support, and attempting to maneuver the ship to avoid imminent collision.

>Dot not worry, Passenger G3454
>This is a simple process that will restore the ship to full functionality
>We approximate your chance of success to 14.591%
>If you fail, passenger G3455 will surely succeed

Game should be played with English keyboard.
